website_summaries.verdict: A good choice to add a different style of bar stool to any home kitchen or bar. Provides a sense of elegance to virtually any setup.
pros: Ergonomically curved seat is extremely comfortable to sit on for long periods of time
cons: May not be comfortable for those who are very short or tall

customer_reviews.title: High Quality! Updated! Returned Them!
customer_reviews.text: These are very sturdy stools, the quality is really good we really like them. Update! I ordered a second set, they too are high quality and nice except..... they were missing the hardware for one stool, I emailed and faxed the missing parts info 2 times... no answer! I returned them!
customer_reviews.author: mdowney

customer_reviews.title: Great stools, but they feel small.
customer_reviews.text: These were easy to install, and they look great. They're also fairly comfortable. However, the reason for my 2 stars is because I feel they are too small for a bar height stool. They look like they're for children, and they feel pretty lightweight too. We have an amazing bar, and needed something that looks "stronger" and more substantial. But since they are still great stools, we will keep them and use them for now, while I look for other bar stools. I will use these as a size reference.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable as barstools you will ever own.
customer_reviews.text: I actually return these barstools. I love them very much but the color brown was not what I needed. I do on the gray chairs and I love them. Takes two people to put these chairs together. Barstools chairs. You only can put the screws in 80% if you want the sturdiness and then someone must sit on them or put a real heavy weight on them. Before you screw the rest of the screw in the other 20%. These chairs are as comfortable as heck.
customer_reviews.author: Vicky V

customer_reviews.title: Cheap hardware and missing pieces.
customer_reviews.text: After receiving this product (4 chairs total) I started to install them immediately. I have been a carpenter for years, so assumed the assembly should be relatively simple considering. Not to my surprise, it was easy as ever, however many of the bolts and tools provided were either missing or so cheap that they would not be able to tighten sufficiently to strengthen the chairs needed to stand. There was multiple bolts missing leaving one chair completely unassembled until they sent what was owed to me. Not the happiest
customer_reviews.author: Dave and Marissa

customer_reviews.title: Awesome chairs
customer_reviews.text: I decide to write this review as I am very impressed with the product. I brought 4 of these chairs from my pub table. They look good and overall it feels good sitting on it. Most often my experience with the bar stools of this height, I am afraid that i would topple backwards. Well designed and well built. Best part is it take only 10 screws to install.so far the easiet and sturdy install process. I strongly recomend these chairs.Hassle free packaging. I have to mention about some sand that came with packing probably due silica packets. No big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Aries

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Received last week, so excited to finally get to put them together! They are really nice and my 250lb husband sits in them very comfortably. But we were also short hardware. Three screws. After reading the reviews of the trouble with support on getting parts, I guess I'm making a trip to the hardware store. Update: found two screws under bottom flap of box. The screws were loose in box when we recieved them. So now just short one screw.
customer_reviews.author: Denese

customer_reviews.title: Great find.
customer_reviews.text: Color is exactly as it looks on my monitor. :) Perfect height for my bar. Very easy to put together. Done in 5 minutes per chair. The synthetic leather looks great and feels great. Would not be able to tell the difference. The stitching on the leather makes it look high end for an economy chair. Just enough cushion to be comfy but not squishy. The back has a nice slope for relaxing, supports lower back - does not go too high. A little restoration hardware look, without the price. I just got them, so no notes on how well they'll hold up - but I'm pretty pleased with the price and quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great stools. QC could definately use improvement.
customer_reviews.text: I love these stools. Nice and comfortable and relatively easy to assemble. I have marked them down because all 4 stools I bought required quite a bit of shaking and poking and prodding to get the excess material out of the frames. I spent more time trying to get all the metal out of the frame than it took for tha actual assembly. If not for this inconvenience I would have given 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Edward

customer_reviews.title: Awful
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy these!!! We bought them and they had clearly been returned. The seats were scratched + punctured and both seats were missing pieces!
customer_reviews.author: Gemma Hart

customer_reviews.title: Super Comfortable Bar Stools!
customer_reviews.text: Waited a while to review these chairs, but they have held up very well. The backrest is great and something I was missing with the stools I previously had at my kitchen island. I was worried that these would tear or wear out quickly, but they have not.
customer_reviews.author: Mailgirl

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful as pictured
customer_reviews.text: I was worried when I saw some of the reviews, but these were super easy to put together and I am over 60 and I female. Lol. The some of the screws were loose in the Box, and the Box itself was not real sturdy and damage to. But no damage to the beautiful chairs.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne N. Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Love these! They were actually too short for our counter, but i ended up keeping them and buying a pub height table to go with them. Assembly took 15 minutes per chair at most and they are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy B

customer_reviews.title: Great stools at a great proce
customer_reviews.text: Love these stools. We paired them with the matching table. They look great, nice dark grey color. They are comfortable and sturdy and a good bar height stool. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: RLC

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and stylish
customer_reviews.text: Look perfect in my new kitchen! The big stitching is a nice detail. Very comfortable and pathetic perfect bar height (42” bar top). Very happy with these - purchased 2 sets (4 stools total)
customer_reviews.author: Anna Harmon

customer_reviews.title: Love!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! I ordered 4 total and they look fantastic! Took about 15 minutes per chair to put together and was easy. Looks like real Leather and are sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Asht

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable/Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, and was packaged securely. The height was perfect for what I needed- seat is 29” a and my counter measures 38”. The stitching is bright orange and figure it will fade with wear. But other than that I have no complaints. Received lots of compliments, definitely would recommend and would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: tkofam03

customer_reviews.title: Best seat in the house
customer_reviews.text: These were so much better than I expected! They are the most comfortable seat in my house. Only complaint is the orange stching is a little ugly imo
customer_reviews.author: Chanty

customer_reviews.title: Well Made & Great Price
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these bar stools for our business office. They are easy to put together and very well made. Further, the gray color looks great with all of our decor. They are also very comfortable. I did a lot of research and these were the best price and have proven to be great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wish I could give -5 Stars!
customer_reviews.text: Product came in half torn packaging, none of the parts were covered and were found half scratched. Screws & assembly parts were missing on the top of it the Assembly page old, dusty & half torn. 5 start reviews for this product is total scam.
customer_reviews.author: bhakti deshmukh

customer_reviews.title: Love the look, concerned on care of packaging
customer_reviews.text: Received chairs today, ordered 4 got 2, box was intact but hardware pkg inside was opened and screws were loose in the bottom of the box. Missing some of the screws to connect the supports. The seats were damaged like they had been scuffed up already. Really disappointed because I love the look of them.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: These bar stools were easy to assemble and they are sturdy and well made. They are certainly a value for the upscale look and quality.
customer_reviews.author: Karen M Hammond-Melms

customer_reviews.title: The chairs are worth the buy
customer_reviews.text: My kids are enjoying there new seats with the table I brought separately. It goes so well the table and the color is so coordinated with it as well. I’m enjoying my money well spent right now
customer_reviews.author: malikah blackwood

customer_reviews.title: Good value, sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Great value for two sturdy chairs. We love them, would have given them 5 stars but the legs came scraped up a bit and it had to be like that when they were packed, because they were completely wrapped in cloth to protect legs.
customer_reviews.author: emmapeele

customer_reviews.title: love these chairs
customer_reviews.text: love these chairs. easy to install and very sturdy. love the padded seats.
customer_reviews.author: nmart

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: I have tried to call and email several times and no response. I bought 2 leather bar stools, only to find out they didn't send hardware to put them together! Come on be more customer friendly! Answer emails and have number that works.
customer_reviews.author: Johna Isackson

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. Super comfortable. Very sturdy. I use at a tall desk where I sit for long periods of time. Very happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: echoustonjr

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: I cannot day enough good things about this item. Everyone that walks in the door compliments these stools. Love, love!!!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia E. Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Awesome buy bought for my counter, great quality easy to put together
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfortable chairs for the kitchen bar
customer_reviews.text: Cute, comfortable and fit around my breakfast bar well The leather-like upholstery is easy to wipe off and I really like the color (brown)
customer_reviews.author: Kelly S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Very comfortable. Looks exactly like the photo.
customer_reviews.author: Smcb

customer_reviews.title: Look great!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my kitchen counter. They look awesome in our space. They are made well and are holding up great with daily use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I looked for a while for chairs. We like these, they are simple to put together and are very sturdy
customer_reviews.author: sushka

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, comfortable !
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy! Very comfortable, I’ve only had them a month, but they are very stable, and think they will last for years. My husband weighs 140 pounds and he agrees.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good looking solid barstools
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for, pretty easy to put together, very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Jester

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 2 sets. Model numbers match, however the decorative stitching is two different colors!
customer_reviews.author: Bobby Berry

customer_reviews.title: Very Impressed!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE these bar stools! I have an open concept living room and these stools compliment my leather couch perfectly. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Whysper Keane

customer_reviews.title: Nice chairs for the $
customer_reviews.text: Nice chairs for the $. Study, comply, & and nice looking. However not good of you have cats with claws. Scratches easy.
customer_reviews.author: lori tejral

customer_reviews.title: Affordable but Great chairs!
customer_reviews.text: Great chairs! Way cheaper than Wayfair or other online retailers
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Set up was easy. They look very nice at our new concrete slab kitchen island.
customer_reviews.author: JeepWranglerMoabGuy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Mod Barstools
customer_reviews.text: I bought used, like new, and they were in perfect condition. Sturdy and beautiful and easy to assemble. Very nice in our Billiards room.
customer_reviews.author: RetroLover

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: Nice, comfortable, pretty chairs. Easy to put together. These are stable barstools and exactly what we needed.
customer_reviews.author: Mbhart

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Bar stools
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable sturdy & stylish. Amazing quality and value for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Preston M.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful and very nice !!!!!! Would buy again !!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Welding broke
customer_reviews.text: These chairs did not even last a a year. They welding broke on the seat and almost caused a fall.
customer_reviews.author: AY

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome barstools. They are super comfortable. Color is exactly as expected and the quality is great!
customer_reviews.author: Jillian

customer_reviews.title: Great design of product and shipping materials
customer_reviews.text: Well protected in the packaging, easy to assemble and great looking. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Hanlon

customer_reviews.title: Bar stools that will impress
customer_reviews.text: When I ordered the bar stools I was on the fence about whether I would like the exposed stitching. Now that they are here I’m very happy with the color, height and the price of the chairs. Assembly was very easy and instructions very simple.
customer_reviews.author: TMac

product_meta.title: Roundhill Furniture Lotusville Vintage PU Leather Barstools, Antique Brown, Set of 2
product_meta.description: Color:BrownSleek and simple, the leather and metal bar stool adds chic, industrial edge to your dining space. This exclusive piece features an iron frame in a black finish.
feature_bullets: Hand crafted metal dining chairs with Vintage PU Leather in Antique brown color, Set of 2
The Leather is upholstered over plastic molded seats for strength and comfort
This chair legs piece features an iron frame in a Black Finish. Features : Without Swivel
Photo may slightly different from Actual Item in Terms of color due to the lighting during Photo Shooting or the Monitor's display

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars84 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
